Good stuff.

I put the folder in the game data folder not sure how to give Jebediah Kerman a gemini 8 space suit I am recreating the gemini docking with agena

Create jebediah folder

Now do I transfer the textures from alternate to this folder ?

1. Find the texture you wish to use - in this case Gemini 8 EVA suit. Copy both of the images in the folder.

2. Open the TextureReplacer file in Game Data folder.

3. Open the Custom Kerbals folder and then the Jebediah Kerman folder.

4. Paste the new suit into the folder and when it asks you replace the files all ready there.

Now when you load the game Jebediah will be wearing the Gemini 8 suit. To change the regual kerbals just pate into the folder named Default.

Easy!

Where can we get that Black and Green version???????????????????????????????????????

Is this only at the loading screen or in space? On my install I'm currently testing a new iridium visor and at the loading screen no reflection but in space I get reflection.

Two ways to check:

One do an EVA in space.

Or two if you don't have a ship in space -

To check go into the plugin file in texture replacer (GameData\TextureReplacer\PluginData\TextureReplacer) and inside the configuration file change :

// Spawn a Kerbal on EVA in his/her IVA suit without helmet and jetpack when

// in breathable atmosphere (oxygen + sufficent pressure).

isAtmSuitEnabled = true

to

// Spawn a Kerbal on EVA in his/her IVA suit without helmet and jetpack when

// in breathable atmosphere (oxygen + sufficent pressure).

isAtmSuitEnabled = false

This will mean that now you can wear a helmet on kerbal. To change back simply change the setting back to true.

Launch a capsule and do an EVA and tell me if you get a reflection.

Better picture.

http://i.imgur.com/6YCOvHd.png

Nice! Visor reflections only happen in space. I will edit the main page and README.
